snippet: Citing evidence found on YouTube, Turkey’s Islamist prime minister, Recep Tayyip Erdogan, claimed on Tuesday that Israel was behind the military takeover in Egypt last month.
abstract: Citing evidence found on YouTube, Turkey’s Islamist prime minister, Recep Tayyip Erdogan, claimed on Tuesday that Israel was behind the military takeover in Egypt last month.

byline.original: By ROBERT MACKEY and SEBNEM ARSU

headline.main: Israel Behind Egypt's Coup, Erdogan Says

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
